examples: Continue the scene naturally, maintaining the same style and motion.
prompt.description: The text prompt describing how the video should be extended
prompt.title: Prompt

duration.description: The duration of the generated video.
duration.title: Duration

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video.
aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio

generate_audio.description: Whether to generate audio for the video.
generate_audio.title: Generate Audio

auto_fix.description: Whether to automatically attempt to fix prompts that fail content policy or other validation checks by rewriting them.
auto_fix.title: Auto Fix

video_url.description: URL of the video to extend. The video should be 720p or 1080p resolution in 16:9 or 9:16 aspect ratio.
video_url.title: Video URL

resolution.description: The resolution of the generated video.
resolution.title: Resolution

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator.
seed.title: Seed

negative_prompt.description: A negative prompt to guide the video generation.
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url
